meanings.definition: A substance that inhibits oxidation, especially one used to counteract the deterioration of stored food products.
meanings.sent1: The antioxidants in the food packaging help keep the products fresh for a longer time.
meanings.sent2: It is important to consume foods rich in antioxidants to maintain good health.
meanings.sent3: The antioxidants in the food fought off the harmful effects of time like brave warriors.
meanings.sent4: Her love for antioxidants was like a shield protecting her favorite snacks from going bad.
meanings.sent5: The antioxidants acted like guardians, preserving the food from spoiling.

meanings.definition: A substance that prevents damage to cells caused by free radicals.
meanings.sent1: Doctors recommend eating fruits high in antioxidants to protect cells from harm.
meanings.sent2: Antioxidants play a crucial role in maintaining the body's overall well-being.
meanings.sent3: The antioxidants swooped in like superheroes to rescue the cells from free radical attacks.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against aging, antioxidants are the fearless defenders of our cells.
meanings.sent5: The antioxidants were like armor, shielding the cells from the harmful effects of free radicals.
